conbody.p:
It is important to note the difference between widgets and the API.
Widget: A collection of widgets that can be embedded into your application with minimal configuration.
Chat Widget Demo: An example of a live, embedded chat that connects directly to your Sametime server.
Core: APIs that are available to communicate directly with a Sametime server.
Components: Presentational React-based components built specifically for Sametime functionality.

APIs can be added to a web application in two ways:
An NPM installable package
A .js file include
